display_name: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index: Problem to keep up enthusiasm to get things done
description:
Item from Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index. [Buysse et. al 1989 (PubMed ID: 2748771)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/2748771/)

[Search for all PSQI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mros/variables?search=psqi)

Original question: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?
